title: Outer Shell and Campandgoslow Bag Collaboration
content:
Two of our favorite brands, Outer Shell and Campandgoslow, have teamed up for a bag collaboration. Let’s check it out…

Campandgoslow sent Outer Shell Eastern and Western handlebar tape fabric to incorporate into the brand’s most popular models, the Drawcord Handlebar bag, one of our all-time favorite on-the-bike small camera bags, and the Stem Caddy.

Drawcord Handlebar Bag Specs:

  • One-handed closure, lid hooks onto the stem
  • 2.6-4.9L capacity
  • 1000D Cordura fabric with custom Campandgoslow Rattler trim.
  • Solid fabric lid (instead of a map case)
  • Can double as a front pocket on a harness/roll setup
  • $130 USD

Stem Caddy Specs:

  • Fits 1L water bottle
  • One-handed closure
    1000D fabric with custom Campandgoslow Rattler Trim
  • $60 USD

The Stem Caddy and Drawcord Handlebar Bag are in stock and shipping today (to the US only) from Campandgoslow.
